title: AI & Jobs
description: How AI changes the job market

slides.title: AI Revolution ü§ñ
slides.text:
ChatGPT, Midjourney, Copilot...

AI is changing how we work. Some jobs disappear, new ones appear.

slides.title: Jobs at Risk ‚ö†Ô∏è
slides.text:
AI can replace:

‚Ä¢ Data entry
‚Ä¢ Basic writing/translation
‚Ä¢ Simple customer service
‚Ä¢ Basic coding
‚Ä¢ Routine analysis

Repetitive = at risk!

slides.question: Which jobs are most at risk from AI?

slides.title: Jobs AI Can't Replace üõ°Ô∏è
slides.text:
Safe(r) from AI:

‚Ä¢ Creative thinking
‚Ä¢ Complex problem solving
‚Ä¢ Emotional intelligence
‚Ä¢ Physical skilled labor
‚Ä¢ Leadership & strategy
‚Ä¢ Unique human connection

slides.title: New Opportunities üöÄ
slides.text:
AI creates jobs:

‚Ä¢ AI trainers
‚Ä¢ Prompt engineers
‚Ä¢ AI ethicists
‚Ä¢ AI-human collaboration
‚Ä¢ Data specialists

Learn to work WITH AI, not against it!

slides.question: Best strategy for AI job market?
slides.explanation: AI is a tool ‚Äî learn to use it! üõ†Ô∏è

slides.title: Future-Proof Skills üí™
slides.text:
Focus on:

‚Ä¢ Critical thinking
‚Ä¢ Creativity
‚Ä¢ Communication
‚Ä¢ Adaptability
‚Ä¢ Tech literacy
‚Ä¢ Emotional intelligence

These + AI knowledge = unstoppable!

slides.title: Start learning AI!
slides.text: Try ChatGPT or similar tools to understand AI capabilities.

summary: You learned about AI and jobs ‚Äî learn to work with AI, not against it!

title: Creator Economy

slides.title: Everyone Can Be a Creator üì±
slides.text:
YouTube, TikTok, Twitch, Substack...

50+ million people earn money creating content!

Could you be one of them?

slides.title: How Creators Earn üí∞
slides.text:
Revenue streams:

‚Ä¢ Ad revenue (YouTube, TikTok)
‚Ä¢ Sponsorships
‚Ä¢ Merchandise
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions (Patreon)
‚Ä¢ Courses/products
‚Ä¢ Affiliate marketing

slides.question: How do most creators earn money?

slides.title: The Reality Check ‚ö†Ô∏è
slides.text:
Truth:

‚Ä¢ Top 1% earn most money
‚Ä¢ Takes 1-3 years to monetize
‚Ä¢ Requires consistency
‚Ä¢ Burnout is real
‚Ä¢ Algorithm changes hurt

Not as easy as it looks!

slides.title: Realistic Expectations üìä
slides.text:
YouTube:
‚Ä¢ Need 1,000 subs + 4,000 hours
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç¨1-3 per 1,000 views
‚Ä¢ 100k views = ‚Ç¨100-300

Most creators earn <‚Ç¨500/month!

Do it for passion, not just money.

slides.question: Best reason to start creating content?
slides.explanation: Passion sustains you through the hard years! ‚ù§Ô∏è

slides.title: Getting Started üöÄ
slides.text:
1. Choose your niche (what you love)
2. Pick one platform
3. Post consistently (quantity ‚Üí quality)
4. Engage with community
5. Improve constantly
6. Don't quit your day job (yet)!

slides.title: Find your niche!
slides.text: What could you talk about for 100+ videos?

summary: You learned about creator economy ‚Äî passion + consistency = potential success!

title: Sustainable Finance

slides.title: Money Can Change the World üåç
slides.text:
Where you put your money matters!

Investing in 'good' companies can push for positive change.

slides.title: What is ESG? üå±
slides.text:
ESG = Environmental, Social, Governance

üåç Environmental: Climate, pollution
üë• Social: Workers, communities
üèõÔ∏è Governance: Ethics, transparency

Companies scored on these factors!

slides.title: Sustainable Investing Options üíö
slides.text:
‚Ä¢ ESG ETFs (filtered companies)
‚Ä¢ Green bonds (fund eco projects)
‚Ä¢ Impact investing
‚Ä¢ Excluding 'sin stocks' (weapons, tobacco)

Your values + your money = impact!

slides.title: Performance Myth Busted üìà
slides.text:
Old belief: 'Sustainable = lower returns'

Reality: ESG funds often match or beat regular funds!

‚Ä¢ Less risk from scandals
‚Ä¢ Future-proof industries
‚Ä¢ Growing demand

slides.question: Do ESG investments have lower returns?
options: Often match or beat regular investments
slides.explanation: ESG often performs just as well or better! üìà

slides.title: Beware of Greenwashing üö©
slides.text:
Greenwashing = pretending to be eco-friendly.

‚Ä¢ Check actual ESG scores
‚Ä¢ Read fund holdings
‚Ä¢ Look for certifications
‚Ä¢ Don't trust marketing alone!

slides.title: Your money, your values!
slides.text: When you start investing, consider ESG options.

summary: You learned about ESG investing ‚Äî align your money with your values!

title: Digital Banking Revolution
description: Neobanks, digital wallets, and the future

slides.title: Banking Without Banks üì±
slides.text:
N26, Revolut, Wise, Monzo...

Neobanks: 100% digital, no branches.

Changing how we use money!

slides.title: Neobank Advantages üëç
slides.text:
‚úÖ Open account in minutes
‚úÖ No/low fees
‚úÖ Real-time notifications
‚úÖ Great apps
‚úÖ Easy international transfers
‚úÖ Spending insights

slides.title: Neobank Risks ‚ö†Ô∏è
slides.text:
Watch out for:

‚Ä¢ Less deposit protection (check!)
‚Ä¢ Customer service issues
‚Ä¢ Features can change
‚Ä¢ Not ideal for complex needs
‚Ä¢ Some aren't 'real' banks

slides.title: Digital Wallets üí≥
slides.text:
Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal...

‚Ä¢ Pay with phone
‚Ä¢ Store multiple cards
‚Ä¢ Online shopping easier
‚Ä¢ More secure than physical cards

Future is contactless!

slides.question: Are digital wallets safe?
options: Yes, often safer than physical cards
slides.explanation: Tokenization makes digital wallets very secure! üîê

slides.title: Best of Both Worlds üè¶
slides.text:
Smart approach:

‚Ä¢ Traditional bank: savings, loans
‚Ä¢ Neobank: daily spending
‚Ä¢ Digital wallet: convenience

Use each for its strengths!

slides.title: Explore your options!
slides.text: Compare neobank features when you're ready for your first account.

summary: You learned about digital banking ‚Äî use traditional and neo banks strategically!

title: Financial Independence for Gen Z

slides.text:

slides.question: Gen Z's biggest financial advantage?
slides.explanation: TIME is your superpower! Start investing NOW! ‚è∞

slides.title: Your Roadmap üó∫Ô∏è
slides.text:

Ages 18-25:
